channel.title: Ddos
channel.description: Guys my VPs is getting ddosed and I can't even turn the VPs on.... What can I do? The hosting company has terrible support so I can't get through

item.title: Ddos
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

I was using Staminues and was paying around $130 per month for it with DDoS protection but the DDoS attacks I was getting were to high and it crashed everything (446k PPS)

Read full topic

item.title: Ddos
item.dc:creator: @Tylers_Pur31 Tylers_Pur3
item.description:
@Tylers_Pur31 wrote:

Buy DDoS protection. Blacklotus.net is good. Although many people have shown hate towards them in the past, I used them for 7 months with a very popular server and had no serious issues with them.

Read full topic

item.title: Ddos
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

[quote=“Doobage, post:2, topic:447047”][quote author=devenb123 link=topic=549947.msg4031023#msg4031023 date=1340764221]
Guys my VPs is getting ddosed and I can’t even turn the VPs on… What can I do? The hosting company has terrible support so I can’t get through
[/quote]

I believe you have to pay for it to get anti DDoS features, but if you cant even get in contact with our host, it’s time you find a new VPS company.[/quote]
Get MyHosting. It’s better

Read full topic

Guys my VPs is getting ddosed and I can’t even turn the VPs on… What can I do? The hosting company has terrible support so I can’t get through
